verbose_text: As an example of such a use of the model to predict outcomes, our experiments in XREF_FIG confirmed the prediction from the model that direct activation of PPARgamma by rosiglitazone should induce the bistable switch with coinduced C/EBPalpha, PPARgamma, and C/EBPbeta expression rather than bypassing the switch and directly regulating the adipogenesis-relevant genes downstream of PPARgamma.
